results.name: Triangle read by rows: zeros except for right border which are the partition numbers A000041.
link: Robert Price, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275, 50 rows.
formula: Infinite lower triangular matrix, partition numbers (A000041, starting 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 11,...) in the main diagonal and the rest zeros.
